oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Efficacy of a BVD Type I MLV Vaccine Against a Virulent BVD Type II Experimental Challenge in Young Calves
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Siger, L.
David, F.
Gallo, G.
Conlon, J. Rice
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bovine viral diarrhea
modified-live vaccine
Type I
Type II
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of this study was to determine the efficacy of a vaccine containing modified-live bovine viral diarrhea virus Type I (BVD1) against a highly virulent BVD Type II (BVD2) challenge in calves.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2000; 189
